channel.title: Slayer exp somones pleasE?i ts really easy
channel.description:
how do you change slayer exp? it dosen't seem like the rest of skills... atm u get 500xnpc hit points so ig npc hp 50 u get 25k points! lol too much
if som1 just tell me where to get it would be great ( im thinking its really easy and im just not looking right) lol

item.title: Slayer exp somones pleasE?i ts really easy
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

If you have the chests for slayer, try searching for “case 104”. If you have it on NPC’s, you are going to have to look for the NPC ID numbers, and just search through you entire client.java file, then change the amount of experience you get per kill for each monster you have set to give slayer experience.

Read full topic
